title: Current account deficit financed by CFA surplus

content.prompt: Which of the following is true of a current account deficit?

choices.label: It is caused by a trade surplus.
It must be financed with an equally large surplus of exports.
It is caused by a deficit in the financial (capital) account.
It will self-correct in the following year.
It is financed by a surplus in the financial (capital) account.

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance
